quote_first: After a moment reality reasserted itself, and she realized she hadn’t been hallucinating, but dreaming. The clock on the desk read 12:55. They’d begun their ten-minute session at
quote_last: , so obviously she had twenty minutes to account for.
title: The Enclave
author: Karen Hancock

quote_first: Mr. Henry Urquhart of Messrs. Urquhart, Wimbush, and Portway was Josephine Fallon’s solicitor. Dalgliesh’s appointment with him was for
quote_last: p.m., a time disobligingly chosen, he felt, to intimate that every minute of the solicitor’s time was valuable and that he was prepared to spare the police no more than half an hour before lunch.
title: Shroud for a Nightingale
author: P.D. James
